summary: This test module validates the generation of CycloneDX software bill of materials (SBOM) JSON output from Checkov's reporting components, covering library component creation, schema version handling, deduplication of SCA packages, and image-specific BOM structures.
business_intent: Ensure that the security scanning platform reliably produces standardsâ€‘compliant CycloneDX SBOMs for infrastructure-as-code and container image analyses, facilitating downstream vulnerability management and compliance workflows.
